name: Jesse the Fisher
description:
A young fisherman named Jesse sank to the bottom of the sea after getting caught in a shipwreck caused by the Sea Monster, Pacazal. According to the mermaid who's been looking after the area decided to help him meet the said monster, Jesse must capture 12 different kinds of non-intelligent creatures of the sea. If he stays at the bottom of the sea for so long, he'll into a fish...

- Creature-capturing Battle System

- Skill Based Mechanism

- Black and White Graphics

- Short Story

Engine: RPG Maker 2003

Music: RPG Maker RTP and freesound.org

Originally made for Black and White Jam with the Theme, "the Deep".

Unfortunately, my schedule got clogged during that time, and was unable to submit an entry. I simply finished this one.
